function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inaccurate readings from wearable sensors may lead to misdiagnosis or delayed diagnosis of diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on wearable technology for disease detection may lead to neglect of traditional diagnostic methods and clinical assessment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validation studies for wearables have not been conducted, creating obstacles for healthcare workers regarding their clinical utility.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"False-positive results from wearables create risks and require greater effort for correct interpretation of the data.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Patients are concerned with the privacy and security of their data when using wearables, as breaching of digital network security can lead to data exposure.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ehealth wearables for covid-19 data interpretation and monitoring.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of wearable devices in the healthcare system.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 through the handling and sharing of wearable devices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices and unobtrusive sensing technologies may not accurately monitor early symptoms of covid-19 or common health conditions, leading to misdiagnosis or delayed treatment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Role of cloud, edge, and fog computing in telehealth monitoring systems may pose security and privacy risks for the sensitive health data transmitted and stored.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices used for maintaining social distancing and contact tracing may raise concerns about data privacy and surveillance.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of wearables to monitor covid-19 symptoms may lead to inaccurate readings or interpretations, resulting in misdiagnosis or inappropriate treatment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wearables for remote assessment of covid-19 patients may overlook other critical symptoms or conditions that require in-person evaluation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and security risks associated with the transmission and storage of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud-based platforms.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost of systems makes them less affordable to the public, limiting access to healthcare technology.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulatory approvals and medical device clearance processes may delay the implementation of healthcare technology.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of multimodal sensing systems for covid-19 symptoms hinders comprehensive disease monitoring and prevention.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing of temperature data with mobile app via bluetooth can lead to unauthorized access of sensitive health information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearable devices may not be accurate, leading to incorrect temperature readings and potential misdiagnosis or improper treatment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of pulse oximeter sensors at non-standard locations or with inaccurate sensors can lead to false readings and misinterpretation of oxygen saturation levels.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of wearable pulse oximeter devices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of respiratory rate monitoring for disease evaluation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cough and lung sound monitoring for contagious disease symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring dry cough for covid-19 detection and prevention.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
